meanings.definition: To make or become Italian in character, culture, or style.
meanings.sent1: She italianized her pasta dish by adding traditional Italian spices.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant italianized its menu by including classic Italian dishes.
meanings.sent3: The pizza became italianized when it was topped with fresh mozzarella and basil.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was italianized with the addition of stylish Italian leather shoes.
meanings.sent5: The room was italianized with Tuscan-inspired decor and warm colors.

meanings.definition: To give an Italian appearance or quality to something.
meanings.sent1: He italianized the building facade with colorful Italian tiles.
meanings.sent2: The artist italianized the painting by using vibrant Italian colors.
meanings.sent3: The garden was italianized with the addition of a charming Italian fountain.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was italianized with the occasional use of Italian phrases.
meanings.sent5: The music was italianized with the infusion of traditional Italian melodies.
